short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy and paste your favorite symbols, emojis, or phrases with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PasterPlus allows you to save frequently copied items to increase your pasting efficiency!

More features:
- Auto-paste selected items on click
- Auto-copy highlighted text
- Create groups to organize items
- Drag the menu anywhere on the screen

Source code: https://github.com/ksucpea/pasterplus
